scripts.setup: source env/local.env && serverless dynamodb install -s local && serverless dynamodb start --migrate && node app/utils/fixSwaggerPath.js
scripts.start: source env/local.env && serverless offline start -s local
scripts.docs: source env/local.env && serverless openapi generate --format json
scripts.test: npm run cleanup && source env/local.env && (sls dynamodb start -s local) & sleep 5 && ./node_modules/.bin/jest && npm run cleanup
